name: Red, Heart, Love - Hand Embroidered Handkerchief
description:
Handkerchiefs are reminiscent of the by gone time when men would romantically offer their handkerchief to a young lady.

Red hand embroidered heart with love written inside.

~It makes a lovely gift for a bride, groom, Valentine's Day or just because.

This handkerchief is white and is measured at approx 15" x 15" square.

This handkerchief comes to you washed, ironed and ready to use. It is machine washable and dry-able.

Personalization available...so, please ask!





Thanks for visiting...Very Pretty Things

name: Starfish Hand Embroidered Handkerchief
description:
Handkerchiefs are reminiscent of the by gone time when men would romantically offer their handkerchief to a young lady.

Hand embroidered Starfish design in a lovely old gold color. This surely makes me dream of the sea.

~It makes a lovely gift for a bride, hostess or for a widow, in memory of their loved one.

This handkerchief is white and is measured at approx 15" x 15" square.

This handkerchief comes to you washed, ironed and ready to use. It is machine washable and dry-able.

Personalization available...so, please ask!




Thanks for visiting...Very Pretty Things
